food.title: Order Food
food.description: Craving something delicious? Explore a wide variety of meals from your favorite restaurants delivered hot & fresh.

flowers.title: Order Flowers
flowers.description: Brighten someone’s day with a fresh bouquet. Choose from roses, lilies, and more — delivered to their doorstep.

medicine.title: Order Medicine
medicine.description: Get your essential medicines and health products delivered quickly and safely without leaving your home.

groceries.title: Order Groceries
groceries.description: From fresh fruits to daily essentials, stock your kitchen with groceries delivered in minutes.

donations.title: Donations
donations.description: Support a good cause by donating to trusted charities. Every contribution makes a difference.
